tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE emergency_shelters(
  shelter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  shelter_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  capacity INT NOT NULL,
  address TEXT,
  city TEXT,
  state TEXT,
  zip_code TEXT,
  phone_number TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE emergency_shelters (
  shelter_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
  shelter_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  capacity INTEGER,
  current_population INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE displaced_individuals (
  individual_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  age INTEGER,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  shelter_id INTEGER,
  FOREIGN KEY (shelter_id) REFERENCES emergency_shelters(shelter_id)
);

CREATE TABLE emergency_shelters (
  shelter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  shelter_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  capacity INT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE displaced_individuals (
  individual_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  age INT NOT NULL,
  gender VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  arrival_date DATE NOT NULL,
  shelter_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (shelter_id) REFERENCES emergency_shelters (shelter_id)
)

CREATE TABLE shelter_capacity (
  shelter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  available_capacity INT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE displaced_individuals (
  individual_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  shelter_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE displaced_individuals (
	displaced_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	age INT NOT NULL,
	gender VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
	shelter_id INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (shelter_id) REFERENCES emergency_shelters(shelter_id)
);

CREATE TABLE occupancy (
	occupancy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	shelter_id INT,
	occupants_count INT NOT NULL,
	last_updated TIMESTAMP,
	FOREIGN KEY (shelter_id) REFERENCES emergency_shelters(shelter_id)
);

CREATE TABLE staff (
	staff_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	staff_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	role VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	shelter_id INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (shelter_id) REFERENCES emergency_shelters(shelter_id)
);
